about_the_game:
Step into the eerie halls of a mysterious mansion where every corner hides a secret and every sound tells a story. In The Bell of Time, you’ll embark on an unforgettable adventure filled with mind-bending puzzles, intense combat, and supernatural encounters.

EXPLORE A HAUNTED MANSION


Navigate through beautifully crafted environments that blend horror and mystery, each room more intriguing than the last.

Solve Ingenious Puzzles
Use your wits and your unique weapon to manipulate your environment, revealing hidden paths and secrets.

Battle Supernatural Foes
Face off against hollow armor sentries and otherworldly entities lurking in the shadows.

Manipulate Time
Interact with bells scattered throughout the mansion to add a new layer of strategy to your survival.

Immersive Atmosphere
Experience a rich soundscape and stunning visuals that draw you deeper into the game’s dark and captivating world.

RESIST MADNESS


You’re resistant to the atmosphere that drives the world mad, but one little blow can send you over the edge. Will you have the strength to keep going?

SUPPORT INDIE DEVELOPERS

Developed by a single person with specially composed music, The Bell of Time is a labor of love crafted over a year of hard work.

Unravel the mysteries of the mansion, conquer its challenges, and uncover the truth behind The Bell of Time. Wishlist now and prepare for an adventure like no other!



The visuals may change between the photos and the real visuals of the game.

short_description: The Bell of Time is an action and horror game but you can return to the past, as much as you can to resolve difficult puzzles and outsmart Xylaris pawns! A sweet mix between Outer Wilds and Portal 2. Developed by a solo indie creator with a haunting atmosphere and original music.
